chapter.title: Development guidelines
chapter.para: This chapter holds some general principles for extending the current code base.

listitem.para: geomajas-project-sld-editor-documentation: the documentation for this project.
geomajas-project-sld-editor-expert-common: the common part of the code, containing events, services and mvp interfaces for this project.
geomajas-project-sld-editor-expert-gwt: implementation of the view interfaces in common for SmartGwt.
geomajas-project-sld-editor-expert-gwt2: implementation of the view interfaces in common for Gwt 2.
geomajas-project-sld-editor-expert-gwt-example: entry point for the Smart Gwt example.
geomajas-project-sld-editor-expert-gwt2-example: entry point for the Gwt 2 example.
geomajas-project-sld-editor-expert-gwt-example-jar: showcase registration for the Smart Gwt example.
geomajas-project-sld-editor-expert-gwt2-example-jar: showcase registration for the Gwt 2 example.

section.title: Events
section.para: The SLD editor widget supports the following events:

listitem.para: SldCancelEvent: Event fired when the user clicks the cancel button.
SldCancelledEvent: Event fired when the cancel event was successful.
SldCloseEvent: Event fired when the user wants to close the current SLD.
SldLoadedEvent: Event that indicates that the Sld has been loaded.
SldSaveEvent: Event fired when the user clicks the save button.
SldValidateEvent: Event that indicates that the Sld must be Validated.
SldValidatedEvent: Event that returns the result of a validationRequest.
TemplateSelectEvent: Event fired when the user selects a template.
TemplateLoadedEvent: Event that indicates that the template has loaded.
TemplateNamesLoadedEvent: Event that indicates that the list of template names has changed.

section.title: Factories and usage
section.para: The SLD editor widget has the following Factories:

listitem.para: SldEditorClientBundleFactory: Sld Editor Resource Factory.
SldEditorEventBusFactory: Sld Editor EventBus Factory.
SldEditorServiceFactory: Sld Editor Service Factory.
SldEditorViewFactory: Sld Editor View Factory.
